author: vors
body:
@jianyunt `tryit.md` and `setup-dev-environment.md` are platform-specific docs, that are described in `building/<platform>.md`
@lzybkr will verify them and update, if needed (per offline discussion).

comments.author: vors
comments.body:
Assigning to @lzybkr for future review.
Documentation about forks is out-of-scope of current PR, because PRs from forks are not supported (fail build on Travis) at the moment.

comments.author: vors
comments.body: We will address possible issues in the next iteration.

title: Update docs, assigned to Sergei
